config_part.ioc_details: Uses LVREMOTE to control LabVIEW VI of Litron Laser

macro.name: STALE_TIME
macro.description: Number of seconds with identical value before assuming wavelength is stale.

macro.name: IPADDR
macro.description: IP Address of machine running VI

macro.name: VI_PATH
macro.description: File path of the VI using / separation (e.g. 'C:/path/to/Vi/' ).
